verses.name: 2 Kings 17:36
verses.text: But the Lord, who brought you up out of the land of Egypt with great power and a stretched out arm, him shall ye fear, and him shall ye worship, and to him shall ye do sacrifice.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:37
verses.text: And the statutes, and the ordinances, and the law, and the commandment, which he wrote for you, ye shall observe to do for evermore; and ye shall not fear other gods.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:38
verses.text: And the covenant that I have made with you ye shall not forget; neither shall ye fear other gods.
